com.vaadin.polymer.paper.element

Interface PaperToastElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Element, EventTarget, HTMLElement, Node

    @JsType
public interface PaperToastElement
extends HTMLElement

    paper-toast provides a subtle notification toast.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SRC 
      static String TAG

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      double getDuration()

      True if the toast is currently visible.

      The text to display in the toast.

      void show()
      Show the toast.
      void toggle()
      Toggle the opened state of the toast.
